p: Carvacrol and thymol are two components that are present not only in the essential oil obtained from these aromatic plants, but also in aqueous methanolic extracts. In one of our previous studies, HPLC analysis showed that the content of phenolic compounds in oregano, thyme and Satureja was 49.99, 41.07, and 39.93 mg/g, respectively [ 19], with carvacrol being the main phenolic compound present in the dry aromatic plants.
